meanings.definition: A person who believes in or advocates for essentialism.
meanings.sent1: The essentialists in our group always focus on the most important details.
meanings.sent2: Many essentialists believe that there are fundamental truths in the world.
meanings.sent3: The essentialists at the party debated the core principles of their philosophy.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as an essentialist among the diverse group of thinkers.
meanings.sent5: The essentialists' dedication to simplicity is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of essentialism.
meanings.sent1: His essentialist approach to design emphasizes functionality over aesthetics.
meanings.sent2: The essentialist viewpoint suggests that there are universal principles.
meanings.sent3: The essentialist decor of the room gave it a timeless feel.
meanings.sent4: Her style is clean and essentialist, focusing on the basics.
meanings.sent5: The essentialist nature of the theory simplifies complex ideas.
